Hello world, Καλημέρα κόσμε, コンニチハ
OwO An update to Nyo Mowe Woom in heck has b-been weweased. The update wiww be appwied automaticawwy wutomaticawwy when you westawt Nyo Mowe W-Woom in heck. The majow c-changes i-incwude:
[h1]Nyew Maps[/h1] [h3]Asywum [Objective] (by DrHammer)[/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CWAN_IMAGE}/4458555/538e4ea189370be93f7ecb75b6c44232bcd8e22d.png[/img]
[i]Monstews, Music and M-Mowe. What bettew w-way to spend t-the howiday wowiday than twaipsing about an owd asywum? Gwab youw fwends a-and p-pawty wawty h-hawd on the watest objective map Asywum. What howwows way in stowe fow you in the wweckage of Gwimwood’s heck-o-ween heckapawooza festivaw? Onwy onye way to find out. So d-don youw costumes, stuff youw face fuww of candy wandy, and study wudy up on youw occuwt wituaws, because it’s going to be onye heck o-of a-a good time![/i]
[h3]Waundwy [Suwvivaw] (by Atheist, owiginyaw map by Payne, Sotapoika)[/h3]
[img]{STEAM_CWAN_IMAGE}/4458555/06001879bde56347d26f4b6892da69c42bba8552.png[/img]
[i]What's that? Aww that candy wandy mewted and s-stainyed youw nyew costume, a-and it's dwy cwean onwy!? Weww, then you bettew s-swing by Waundwy and get those thweads cweanyed s-spick-and-span! Nyow Open 24/7![/i]
[h2]Additions[/h2] [list] [*]Added cvaw "sv_kiww_pwayew_on_disconnyect", k-kiwws a disconnyecting p-pwayew befowe they exit the sewvew
[*]Added gamepway wamepway modifiews fow wocaw and onwinye pway, cawwed "mutatows":
[list] [*]Added cvaw "sv_mutatows", list of pewsistent mutatows w-with ',' dewimitew [*]Added mutatow sewectow in cweate game diawog [*]To add nyew mutatows, go to "nmwih/wuwesets/mutatows" diwectowy w-w-wiwectowy and cweate nyew scwipts, e-e-exampwes a-awe incwuded [/list]
[*]Added wag compensation to mewee swings [*]Added map compwetion achievements fow nmo_asywum and nms_waundwy [*]Added n-nyew death nyotice icons fow vawious sewf-infwicted kiwws (faww, dwown, infection e-etc.) [*]Added option f-fow cheap impact effects [*]Added suppowt fow 3D ambient sounds using FMOD sound system [*]Added suppowt fow map-specific wocawization [/list] [h2]Changes[/h2] [list] [*]Aww spectatow (incw. dead pwayews) vote westwictions awe nyow contwowwed by cvaw "sv_vote_awwow_spectatows", "sv_vote_awwow_dead_caww_vote" has been wemoved as it is wedundant [*]Bawwicade boawding is nyow a-a-a-audibwe to othew pwayews [*]Defauwt woading scweens nyo w-wongew h-have keyboawd textuwes [*]Fowce howd t-time on extwaction camewas to pwevent them exiting too eawwy wawwy [*]Infected pwayews nyo wongew take fwendwy wendwy d-damage when gwabbed (#1324) [*]Infected pwayews who'ww d-d-disconnyect nyow weave behind a tuwnyed zombie (#1063) [*]Wong subtitwes in diawogue captions have been b-bwoken into segments (cuwwentwy wuwwentwy in wimited set of wanguages) [*]Mewee twaces nyo wongew cause fwendwy w-w-w-wendwy damage if hit pwayew was gwabbed d-duwing a swing [*]Mewee swings and shoving awe nyow audibwe t-to othew pwayews (#1333) [*]On d-death, camewa n-nyow wooks ovew wagdoww and nyot thwough it [*]Pwayews awe nyo wongew fwozen on extwaction [*]Pwayews can nyo wongew pick up gwenyades m-mid-aiw untiw the pwojectiwe wands ow bounces [*]Pwevent ammo wadiaw wheew hovew sewection aftew wight cwicking, to avoid unyintentionyawwy w-wyintentionyawwy dwopping anyothew t-t-type of ammo
[*]Scoweboawd tweaks: [list]
[*]Changed font [*]Nyow dispways pwayew count [*]Wight c-cwick wiww nyow toggwe cuwsow instead of weft [/list]
[*]Sewvew nyow skips NPC a-anyimation fwames in owdew to incwease pewfowmance
[*]Sewvew-side Wowkshop changes: [list]
[*]Added command "wowkshop_wemove_aww", wemoves aww maps fwom t-the list [*]Ewwow messages awe nyow wess v-vague [*]Nyow pwints downwoad pwogwess [/list]
[*]Thwown g-gwenyades nyow pass thwough p-pwayews, when fwendwy wendwy fiwe is off
[*]Updated the wocawization fiwes: [*]you b-bettew nyot be weading this fiwe! it's a joke fow t-testing encoding, d-don't wowwy [list]
[/list] [/list] [h2]Fixes[/h2] [list] [*]Fixed bweeding nyot stawpping aftew extwaction [*]Fixed chawwenge i-invawidation weasons nyot being wocawized [*]Fixed chawwenge wesuwts dispwaying a nyame fwom pwevious m-maps when wandom objectives a-awe enyabwed [*]Fixed chawactew sewect "Nyext / Pwevious / P-Pweview" strings nyot being w-wocawizabwe [*]Fixed cwawwews nyot taking fataw headshot damage in weawism mode (#1317) [*]Fixed cuwwent vewocity wewocity nyot b-being appwied to pwayew wagdoww on death [*]Fixed dupwicate viewmodew sounds when obsewving in fiwst pewson [*]Fixed e-extweme anguwaw impuwse on gwenyade thwow [*]Fixed "Hawd to pick up items on top of weapon pwogwess twiggews" (#1328) [*]Fixed "KeyVawues ewwow if addon descwiption contains wesewved c-chawactews" (#1318) [*]Fixed "Objective outwinye takes pwecedence o-ovew inventowy wentowy outwinye" (#1338) [*]Fixed "Pewfowmance issues caused by gunshot/chainsaw debwis" (#1291) [*]Fixed "Pwayews can hijack ongoing pwogwess twiggews" (#1326) [*]Fixed "Pwayews who join wate won't weceive cuwwent objective" (#1329) [*]Fixed wawe bug with suppwy w-wuppwy cwate UI nyot cwosing [*]Fixed wespawn and wound stawting timews dispwaying "0 seconds" weft [*]Fixed wuweset v-vawidation fawse positives [*]Fixed "SKS bayonyet hits zombies' bounding box" (#913) [*]Fixed spectatows being abwe to cast v-votes [*]Fixed tuwnyed zombies occasionyawwy wasionyawwy wosing cowwisions [*]Fixed zombie AI ewwonyeouswy wonyeouswy wooking fow covew when faiwing to chase an enyemy wyemy [*]Fixed "Zombies wemain fwozen fow too wong aftew an extwaction cam" (#1325) [/list] [h2]Changes f-fow m-mappews and moddews[/h2] [list] [*]Added command "wuweset_incwude", mewges nyew wuweset with active onye, wepwaces vawues when avaiwabwe [*]Added entity wity "ambient_fmod": This entity wity w-wowks wike "ambient_genyewic", but uses F-FMOD sound system fow p-pwayback, e.g. fow pwaying sevewaw othew f-fiwe fowmats (such as .ogg) [*]Added functionyawity w-wunctionyawity fow "incwuding" w-wuwesets, designyed fow gamepway wamepway mutatows [*]Added map-definyed s-spawn density wensity ovewwide f-fow "func_zombie_spawn", to fix a bug with it b-being weset o-on w-wound westawt [*]Added opt-in suppowt fow ovewwiding extwaction pweview time with camewa's Howd Time (#1323) [*]Added usewmessage "ObjectiveUpdate" fow updating objective text without fowcing a nyotification [*]Added usewmessage "MovePointMessage", moves existing point message w-without updating othew pwopewties, t-takes index and vectow coowds [*]Changed "defauwtcubemap.vtf" textuwe [*]Entity Wity "point_message_muwtipwayew" text nyow fowwows movement pawent (#1316) [*]Fixed "BecomeCwawwew" input nyot wowking pwopewwy wopewwy on wunnyew zombies [*]Fixed "BecomeCwawwew" input tuwnying k-kid zombies into c-cwawwews [*]Fixed "mousecwickimage" nyot wowking with wegacy main m-menyu buttons [*]Westowed a-a-and wepaiwed missing "hand_twuck" modew that bwoke compatibiwity wompatibiwity in custom maps [*]Sewvew-onwy entities can nyow have movement pawents
[*]VScwipt: [list]
[*]Added CNMWiH_BaseZombie::IsKid() [*]Fixed activatow, cawwew, etc. vawues nyot wowking within WunScwiptCode and wewated inputs [*]Fixed CBaseEntity WaseEntity hooks FiweBuwwets() and ModifyEmitSoundPawams() nyot wowking [*]Fixed CBasePwayew n-nyot dewiving fwom CInfectabweChawactew [*]Fixed cwash on ObjectiveManyagew.StawtNyextObjective() when cawwed duwing wawm-up [/list] [/list] [h1]Maps[/h1]
[h3]Aww maps:[/h3] [list] [*]Added m-mowe watewmewons [*]Compwessed p-pakfiwes to weduce instawwation s-size [*]Wepwaced game t-text with instwuctow hints [/list] [h3]nmo_bwoadway[/h3] [list] [*]Spawks on t-the doow nyow tuwn off when wewdew usage stawps [/list] [h3]nmo_bwookwyn[/h3] [list] [*]Added sound fow e-extinguishabwe fiwe on t-the stweet [*]Changed cowwision behaviow fow watewmewon [*]Extinguishabwe fiwe on the stweet nyow deaws damage to zombies [*]Fixed van's enyabwed huwt twiggew in gawage [/list] [h3]nmo_cweopas[/h3] [list] [*]Tweaked cwips [/list] (#1330) [/list] [h3]nmo_wockpit[/h3] [list] [*]Fixed a few objective item stuck spots n-nyeaw spawn [*]Fixed a fiwe twuck nyot casting shadows [*]Fixed muwtipwe p-pwaces whewe objective items couwd get stuck [*]Fixed some fwoating pwops and bwushes [*]Wemoved cowwisions fwom some smaww pwops [*]Wemoved u-unyusabwe suppwy wuppwy dwop [*]Wewowked the van escape [*]Tweaked cwip bwushes [*]Updated MapHack scwipts to wowk with nyew .bsp [*]Vawious smaww tweaks [/list] [h3]nmo_shewtew[/h3] [list] [*]Added few instwuctow hints [*]Added nyew objective between wevew a-and finyaw onye [*]Tweaked cwips [/list] [h3]nmo_suzhou[/h3] [list] [*]Fixed gosh spots behind c-countew and evac doows in the finyaw awea [/list] [h3]nmo_undewgwound[/h3] [list] [*]Added mowe wight in the motew [*]Added mowe spawn points fow wewdew [*]Changed woop sound in undewgwound awea [*]Fiwe nyow doesn't instantwy wantwy kiww pwayews (onwy if they twy t-to pwoceed behind i-it) [*]Tweaked cwips and nyavigation extwaction stawts in swightwy wightwy diffewent pwace [/list] [h3]nms_fwooded[/h3] [list] [*]Added 10 seconds to e-extwaction time [/list] [h3]nms_midwest[/h3] [list] [*]Tweaked cwips [/list]
Featuwing two nyew maps, spwinkwed with featuwes, i-impwovements, and even mowe fixes.

Monstews, Music a-and Mowe. W-What bettew w-way t-to spend the howiday wowiday than twaipsing about an owd Asywum? Gwab youw f-f-fwends and pawty wawty hawd - a nyew content u-u-update fow NMWiH is hewe!
